Filter Pack.name: Комплект фильтров
Filter Pack.description: +2 защиты от Скверны во время атак Скверны. Одноразовый.

Zapti long-gun.name: Заптийский длинноствол
Zapti long-gun.description: Стандартный длинноствольный пистолет полицейских Города-корабля, выдаваемый заптийским офицерам.

Flamethrower.name: Огнемёт
Flamethrower.description: Незаменимый предмет отряда исследователей и идеальный инструмент для уничтожения всех видов Скверны, от наростов на кораблях до переливчатых насекомых, роящихся в руинах Зодчих.

Low Capacity.name: Малоёмкое
Low Capacity.description: Если при атаке выпала одна или более 1 (даже без усилия) — это значит, что магазин пуст и оружие нужно перезарядить (полное действие, 1 припас).

Fusillard revolver.name: Фузилярный револьвер
Fusillard revolver.description: The most common handgun on Ship City, used by commoners, zapti constables, and thugs alike.

Defense chaff.name: Defense chaff
Defense chaff.description: LOGIC roll (reaction) gives −2 dice to incoming attack

Countermeasure Dispenser.name: Countermeasure Dispenser
Countermeasure Dispenser.description: LOGIC roll (reaction) gives −2 dice to incoming attack

Long.name: Длинное
Long.description: +2 кубика к атакам и блокированию в первом раунде боя.

Fusillard carbine.name: Фузилярный карабин
Fusillard carbine.description: A favorite amongst guards in explorer crews, the fusillard carbine is easy to use and robust. Its only disadvantages are the heavy use of ammunition and relative short range.

Delving suit, standard.name: Delving suit, standard
Delving suit, standard.description: Standard suits offer a balanced level of protection and flexibility, suited for most delving missions. With reinforced padding, enhanced filtration, and an expanded oxygen supply, these suits endure moderate hazards. Often called the Charrumak Suit, named after Master delver Direl Charrumak, this model is trusted by explorers who need both durability and adaptability in unpredictable conditions.

Electric Lantern.name: Electric Lantern
Electric Lantern.description: Removes the effects of darkness in the user’s zone.

Concealable.name: Concealable
Concealable.description: Requires PERCEPTION test to spot during a search.

Plow.name: Plow
Plow.description: Modifies damage and crit threshold when ramming, eliminates damage to rammer

Bulky.name: Громоздкое
Bulky.description: −2 при проверках ЛОВКОСТИ, если не в состоянии невесомости.

Fusillard spewer.name: Фузилярный изрыгатель
Fusillard spewer.description: Запрещённый в Городе-корабле, изрыгатель обычно устанавливается на роверы.

High Capacity.name: Вместительное
High Capacity.description: После боя бросьте D6 – при 4+ перезарядка не требуется.

Grape pistol.name: Картечный пистолет
Grape pistol.description: A relic from the Old Horizon, easy to reproduce and favored by members of the Black Toad and thugs.

Smoke Dispenser.name: Smoke Dispenser
Smoke Dispenser.description: Blocks vision in one zone (see page 59 for more detail)

Lumin rifle.name: Люмениевая винтовка
Lumin rifle.description: A sought-after heirloom, used by Coriolites and their honorary guards. The lumin technology has yet to be reproduced by any of the Guilds weapon smiths.

Flexible.name: Гибкое
Flexible.description: Может быть использовано для захвата с модификатором +2. Только для оружия ближнего боя.

Harpoon cannon.name: Гарпунная пушка
Harpoon cannon.description: Can haul other rovers if combined with Tow Line

Grappling gun.name: Пистолет-крюк
Grappling gun.description: A delver favorite, the grappling gun was made for climbing in ruins. Wreckers have modified them to shoot solid bolts with a rotating chamber, calling them “volvers.”

Fire.name: Огненное
Fire.description: Поджигает цель с интенсивностью (стр. 71) равной указанному числу.

Maneuvering Thrusters.name: Maneuvering Thrusters
Maneuvering Thrusters.description: Used to maneuver an exo in zero-G. Each use consumes 1 supply.

Coiler rifle.name: Катушечная винтовка
Coiler rifle.description: The coiler rifle is the most common weapon issued to guards and militia across the Horizon. Its long barrel makes it less useful for delvers and ship crews.

Fusillard cricket.name: Фузилярный сверчок
Fusillard cricket.description: Компактный и незаметныйю Пользуется популярностью у тех, кто не склонен к насилию, например, у актёров и барменов.

Grape.name: Картечное
Grape.description: При попадании все на ближней дистанции от цели получают одинаковый урон.

Delving suit, heavy.name: Delving suit, heavy
Delving suit, heavy.description: Heavy suits are built for high-risk environments, with full-body plating, advanced filtration, and robust life support systems. These suits sacrifice some agility for maximum protection and are favored by miners, deep-space explorers, and combat-oriented delvers. Known as the Erafat Suit after the deep rift for which it was originally made, this suit is renowned for its resilience in the most extreme conditions.

Magnetic Boots.name: Magnetic Boots
Magnetic Boots.description: Negates the effects of zero-G (page 72) but makes movement a full action.

Powered.name: Powered
Powered.description: After combat, a supply point must be spent to recharge the weapon. Noted for close combat weapons only (all ranged weapons must be reloaded/recharged after the combat).

Saw blades.name: Saw blades
Saw blades.description: Modifies damage and crit threshold when ramming, eliminates damage to rammer

Explosive.name: Взрывчатое
Explosive.description: При попадании все в зоне поражения получают одинаковый урон (стр. 71).

Delving suit, light.name: Delving suit, light
Delving suit, light.description: Light delving suits focus on mobility and ventilation, ideal for scouts and surveyors who value speed over heavy protection. These suits offer basic environmental filters and a compact oxygen supply, perfect for short, low-risk missions. Lightweight and modular, they allow for easy tool attachments. Sometimes known as the Bandak Suit after its creator, Master Samiir Bandak, this suit is a favorite among those who prize agility and freedom of movement.

Single Shot.name: Однозарядное
Single Shot.description: Это оружие нужно перезаряжать после каждого выстрела (действие, 1 припас).

Ejector.name: Ejector
Ejector.description: Discards wearer from exo as a free action.
